price: Kuma ba su ƙaddara Allah a kan haƙĩƙanin* ĩkon yinsa ba: ¡asã duka damƙarSa ce, a Rãnar ¡iyãma, kuma sammai abũbuwan naɗewa ne ga dãmanSa. Tsarki ya tabbata a gare Shi, kuma Ya ɗaukaka daga barin abin da suke shirki da shi.
arabic: وَمَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ جَمِيعٗا قَبۡضَتُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ مَطۡوِيَّٰتُۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
footnotes: * Yã yi bayãnin yadda zã a iya ƙaddara Allah a kan haƙĩƙanin ĩkon yin Sa da cewa, "ƙasã duka damƙarSa ce har zuwa ƙarshen sũrar. Wãtau yã dunƙule sũrar abũbuwan da zã su auku a Rãnar Ƙiyãma dõmin su bai wa mai hankali yadda suranta ikon yi na Allah Mai girma zai yiwu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi wal-arḍu jamīʿan qabḍatuhu yawma al-qiyāmati wal-samāwātu maṭwiyyātun biyamīnihi sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
